projects.title: Epileptic Seizure Predicion
projects.description: I collaborated with a team of six members to create EpiHealth, an innovative platform designed to predict epileptic seizures utilizing data from wearable devices. We employed tools like Pandas and Numpy for data preprocessing. Furthermore, we trained and implemented a cutting-edge LSTM architecture using Pytorch to predict seizures. We were honored with the Toronto Cohort‚Äôs Accelerator Award of the AI4Good Lab for the development of EpiHealth.

projects.title: Snake AI
projects.description: Trained a Deep Q Network for Reinforcement Learning to play the Atari game "Snake" using the PyTorch and Pygame libraries in Python with a deep neural network and a convolutional neural network

projects.title: UNET for Semantic Segmentation
projects.description: Trained a Convolutional Neural Network to label different regions of an image and experimented with different hyper-parameters for semantic segmentation on the Cityscapes Image Pairs Dataset using PyTorch and NumPy
